This class defines a message containing a message code and arbitrary data that can be sent to a Handler. More...

Detailed Description

This class defines a message containing a message code and arbitrary data that can be sent to a Handler.

See also:
Handler

gaia::core::Messenger* gaia::core::Message::getReplyMessengerN ( ) const

Create a Messenger where replies to this message can be sent.

gaia::core::Handler* gaia::core::Message::getTarget ( ) const

Retrieve the user-defined Handler that will receive this message.

The object must implement Handler::handleMessage(). Each Handler has its own name-space for message codes, so you do not need to worry about yours conflicting with other handlers.

Returns:
the target Handler or null if no handler set.
void gaia::core::Message::sendToTarget ( )

Sends this Message to the Handler specified by setTarget().

Do nothing if no Handler set.
